goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
graph_title: Average tariff applied by developed countries, by type of product
indicator_name: Weighted average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
target_name: 최빈개도국 수입품에 대한 특혜 원산지규정 투명성 및 명료성을 포함하여 최빈개도국의 무관세 및 수량규제 없는 시장접근에 대한 WTO 결정을 시의성있게 이행
page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
title: Average tariffs faced by developing countries, least developed countries and small island developing States
target: Realize timely implementation of duty-free and quota-free market access on a lasting basis for all least developed countries, consistent with World Trade Organization decisions, including by ensuring that preferential rules of origin applicable to imports from least developed countries are transparent and simple, and contribute to facilitating market access
